vclaim: Then-U.S. President Donald Trump's former chief political strategist Steve Bannon said "All hell is going to break loose" the day before the Jan. 6, 2021 attack on the U.S. Capitol.
title: Did Bannon Say ‘All Hell Is Going To Break Loose’ Before Capitol Attack?
subtitle: A number of false and fear-mongering theories about the 2020 election were pushed on Bannon's podcast in the days before the Capitol attack.
author: Dan Evon
